title: The Push for Impeachment Continues
itunes:title: The Push for Impeachment Continues
description:
Kevin spoke with Adrienne Elrod, Democratic Strategist, Former Director of Strategic Communications for the Hillary Clinton Presidential Campaign and Frank Maisano, Partner at Bracewell’s Policy Resolution Group.

They discussed President Donald Trump's comments today, the possibility of impeachment, and what to expect in the coming days.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
